RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since June 25 Allowed 2 lbs. (*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awa rds).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVE MY CHERYL was in touch, a factor on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch proved best. HEADING WEST was unhurried early, had to check into the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch finished well. MAKES SENSE TO ME tracked the early leaders from the outside and raced evenly on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch needed more. DEVIL IN HER HEART was up close and had a clear lead on the turn but was headed at the top of the stretch and had nothing left. MIMI'S HOLIDAY was off slow and saved ground on the turn but was no real threat. WHATSWRONGWITHYOU was away alertly but lost ground on the turn, was outdistanced and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Whatswrongwithyou
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, lost ground turn, outdistanced, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Mimi's Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, saved ground turn, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Heading West
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, checked into turn, 5-path stretch, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Devil in Her Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, clear lead turn, headed top stretch, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Love My Cheryl
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, factor turn, 3-path stretch, proved best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: James Everatt, Janeane Everatt & Arika Everatt-Meeuse

ENTRY.NAME: Makes Sense to Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside, evenly turn, 4-path stretch, needed more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 23700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS SINCE JULY 25, 2021 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claimi ng Price $12,500, if for $12,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (*Plus Up To $810 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KHOZZY VALINTINE broke poorly, moved up on the turn and with a bid from the three path at the top of the stretch fought gamely for the win. MORE SAVVY was hustled early, had the lead on the turn and vied through the stretch in a good effort. TRISH THE DISH was in range but trailed the field on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was up for show. FANCYSOUL broke outward and was roused on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was no threat. GLITTER BAY was away alertly and a factor on the turn but dropped back through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: More Savvy
ENTRY.OWNER: Radcliffe Racing Stable and Admiral Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, led turn, vied stretch, good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Glitter Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, factor turn, dropped back strech

ENTRY.NAME: Trish the Dish
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, trailed turn, 3-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Khozzy Valintine
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke poorly, moved up turn, bid 3-path stretch, fought gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Fancysoul
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, roused turn, 4-path stretch, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 7F Turf CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 16100. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, if for $3,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited to 10 starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNBRIDLED INFERNO was unhurried early, gained ground on the far turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch drew clear. MISS D'S PRIDE stalked the early leader, was a factor on the far turn and had the lead from the three path in upper stretch but was no match for the winner. LADY OF THE FORT was in touch and raced evenly on the far turn but needed more. THIS CAT IS BY JAX was off the pace, had a mild gain on the far turn and was up for a share. AMEN TO THAT was in mid pack and had a good position on the far turn but had no late kick. WIN THE DRAW was well back and trailed the field on the far turn but passed tired foes through the stretch. BROADWAY RUCKUS was in range and roused on the far turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had no response. PRINCE FOR A DAY set the pace and had a clear lead on the far turn but dropped back through the stretch. FIRST ROUND had no speed and showed little in a dull effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady of the Fort
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly far turn, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Amen to That
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, good position far turn, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Miss D's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor far turn, led 3-path stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: This Cat Is by Jax
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain far turn, up for share

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Inferno
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, gained ground far turn, 5-path stretch, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: First Round
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, showed little, dull effort

ENTRY.NAME: Prince for a Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead far turn, dropped back stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Win the Draw
ENTRY.OWNER: Silver Duck Racing Stable Pollard Joseph and McLean Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed far turn, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Broadway Ruckus
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused far turn, 4-path stretch, no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 21600. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 120 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ERNIE'S MARTINI tracked the early leaders from the inside, was a factor on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. EIN WAHRER SOLDAT was unhurried early, had a mild gain on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was up for place. AUTUMN'S SO FLASHY was in mid pack and moved up on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was all out. I LIVE BY FAITH set the pace and had the lead on the turn but was headed at the top of the stretch and gave way. I'M NO SLEEPY JOE was off the pace and saved ground on the turn but was no real threat. WIKWEMIKONG GHOST was well back, trailed the field on the turn and from the eight path at the top of the stretch was not a factor. TAYBO stalked the early leaders from the outside but chased on the turn and had no impact. BUSTA GROOVE was in touch and had a good position on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Ernie's Martini
ENTRY.OWNER: Chesney, Stephen and Hoffman, Cory S.
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, factor turn, 4-path stretch, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: I'm No Sleepy Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground turn, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Autumn's So Flashy
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, moved up turn, 4-path stretch, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Wikwemikong Ghost
ENTRY.OWNER: Desruisseaux Dale DiSalvo Peter and Solo Racing Ltd
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed turn, 8-path stretch, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Busta Groove
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, good position turn, 6-path stretch, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Ein Wahrer Soldat
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, mild gain turn, 4-path stretch, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: I Live by Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, led turn, headed top stretch, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Taybo
ENTRY.OWNER: Catalano Gerard Gnozzo Victor A and Davis Richard M
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, chased turn, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 7F Turf CR: 76. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE JULY 25, 2021 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claimi ng Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances)(Limited to 10 starters) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on thet urf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILENT GUROO set the pace, had the lead on the far turn and with mild pressure through the stretch prevailed. BORN TO BE GOOD was in range, moved up on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch finished well. PLUIE D'AVRIL was unhurried early and a factor on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch was all out. FRESH DREAMS was in touch, raced evenly on the far turn and was up for a share. HASN'T HIT ME YET was in mid pack and hustled along on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch needed more. MUSICAL RIDE stalked the early leader but chased on the far turn and weakened. MONASTERY LANE was off the pace and saved ground on the far turn but failed to fire. LOOKIN TO FLY was well back, showed nothing and was never in contention. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER ON PLUIE D'AVRIL AGAINST SILENT GUROO FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE THROUGH THE STRETCH WAS NOT ALLOWED.

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Guroo
ENTRY.OWNER: Voyce Robyn Voyce Casey Grant and Athoe Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, led far turn, mild pressure stretch, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Hasn't Hit Me Yet
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, hustled along far turn, 5-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Lookin to Fly
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, showed nothing, never in contention

ENTRY.NAME: Monastery Lane
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground far turn, failed to fire

ENTRY.NAME: Fresh Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly far turn, up for share

ENTRY.NAME: Musical Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, chased far turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Born to Be Good
ENTRY.OWNER: Roberto Joseph I and Cathcart Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, moved up far turn, 4-path stretch, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Pluie d'Avril
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, all out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 25 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: J M R GEMMA was up close, had a slim lead on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch held sway. SHELLY THE ROCKET was unhurried early, gained ground on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch was second best. ROAD MAP was away alertly, hustled along on the turn, angled out at the top of the stretch and was up for show. PENNIESFROMABOVE was in range and raced evenly on the turn but needed more. KATY AND EMMA was in touch and roused on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had no rally. GREEN GABLES was hustled early and dueled on the turn but had nothing left. ONE LAST FLING showed speed from the inside but chased on the turn and faded. FORMENTOR was off slow and showed little while outrun. READY TO RUMBLE was off the pace, showed nothing and was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: One Last Fling
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, chased turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Road Map
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, hustled along turn, angled out stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Penniesfromabove
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly turn, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Ready to Rumble
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, showed nothing, never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Green Gables
ENTRY.OWNER: Heritage Hill Farm and D-Mac Racing Stable Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, dueled turn, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: J M R Gemma
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, slim lead turn, 4-path stretch, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Katy and Emma
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, roused turn, 4-path stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Formentor
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, showed little, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Shelly the Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, gained ground turn, 5-path stretch, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 74. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Limited To 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRUMLIN BIRD was in touch, had a good inside position on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch proved best. BABY MO was in range, a factor on the turn and had the lead from the three path in mid stretch but was outfinished. NEW YORK MINT settled off the pace, had a mild gain on the turn and was up for show. SHANGHAI KIMMY was in mid pack and raced evenly on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was all out. MS. P'S BELLA was off the pace and hustled along on the turn but had no late kick. SWEET FINALE was unhurried early and saved ground on the turn but had no impact. EASY ACCESS was hustled early and had the lead on the turn but was headed in mid stretch and faded. SAVVY'S SISTER was well back, trailed the field on the turn and was not a factor. ALLABOUTTHEDRAMA was up close but lost ground on the turn and was empty.

ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed turn, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Access
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, led turn, headed mid stretch, faded

ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, good inside position turn, 4-path stretch, proved best
